definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
(idiom) to use methods in line with local circumstances

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同時他也因政府保釋克萊斯勒而被捲入巨大爭議。

sentences.english: His running is burning him up.
His nose is stopped up with a cold.
Huey was awaiting trial for murder.
sentences.chinese: 休伊因謀殺罪正在等候審判。

sentences.english: Noon because of the "Chen-yang", so end of the five also called the "Dragon Boat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 又因午時爲“陽辰”，所以端五也叫“端陽”。

sentences.english: He was abashed at forgetting his wife's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他因忘了妻子的生日而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Because of your temple at Jerusalem kings will bring you gifts.
sentences.chinese: 因你耶路撒冷的殿，列王必帶貢物獻給你。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社對因申請方或他人的過錯造成的損失不負責。

sentences.english: He was put into prison for robbing the bank.
sentences.chinese: 他因搶銀行而被投入了監獄。

sentences.english: She was much looked up to for her kindnesses .
sentences.chinese: 她因多行善事而受人尊敬。

sentences.english: It is useless for a girl to quarrel with fate because she is not a boy.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子因自己非男孩而自怨命苦是無用的。

sentences.english: The less girl were inconsolable at the loss of IT kitten.
sentences.chinese: 那個小女剛出生的孩子因失去她的小貓而傷心不已。

sentences.english: Many people traumatized by what they had experienced.
sentences.chinese: 多人因這次經歷受到創傷。

sentences.english: And earlier this month, the government executed its top food-and-drug regulator after convicting him on bribery charges.
sentences.chinese: 本月初，政府因受賄罪處決了原國家藥檢局的局長。

sentences.english: These alues may ary with temperature in a coupled analysis.
sentences.chinese: 這些數值可能因溫度的改變而改變。

definition: due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)

quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to lead to/to trigger/to initiate/to cause/to evoke (emotions)
